natural solution: Recall that "one-fourth of" means the same thing as "one-fourth times."
So we are asked to find  \[ \frac{1}{4}\cdot 6 \cdot 8. \]We then have \[ \frac{1}{4}\cdot 6 \cdot 8 =\frac14\cdot 48 = \frac{48}{4} = 48\div 4 =\boxed{12}. \]
